message: Bob, I believe this product presents a unique opportunity for you, and I'm pleased to offer it to you for $2,000,000.  I'm confident you'll find this a worthwhile investment.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of the product. I would like to propose a price of $1,800,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer. While your initial offer was a bit lower than I had hoped for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose a price of $1,900,000.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to consider a compromise. I would like to counter with a price of $1,850,000 for the product.
